page.title: 05Police Force - Guisborough
page.content: The police force of Guisborough consists of 30 constables(6 females),8 sergeants(1 female) and 2 inspectors(1 female). A p.constable on foot patrol is not expected to cover a specific distance each day,but may cover up to 15 miles per patrol and even more when covering another P.C's beat.Breaks are taken every 3 to 4 hours. The P.C's work on a normal shift basis,but each day there are a couple of P.C's who work a cover beat of 16 hrs to ensure that at least one person can relate the events of one shift to the next P.C who is on duty. Guisborough's police station includes 2 male cells,1 female cell,1 8 man cell and 1 juvenile cell. The main aim of Guisborough's police is to keep the peace and protect personal property.
